section.title:
rejected materials by vendor
vendors rejected materials to Rejected Material by Vendor
section.para: To view rejected material by Vendor, select the "Rejected Material by Vendor" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying rejected material by Vendor, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Vendor Number of the Vendor whose rejected material you want to view.
Select to display rejected material by Vendor for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose rejected material by Vendor you want to display.
Rejected material by Vendor entered on and after this date will be displayed.
Rejected material by Vendor entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Select to display rejected material by Vendor for all Purchasing Agents.
Specify Purchasing Agent whose rejected material by Vendor you want to display. Users may be designated as Purchasing Agents at the system level.
Display lists rejected material by Vendor, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
